sentences.en: All flowing water, though it appears to be uniform, is actually divided into extensive inner surfaces, or layers, moving against one another.
sentences.cn: 所有流水尽管看起来是一样的，实际上是分成了大量相互碰撞的内在表层。

sentences.en: Cut down between the bones so that all the chops are of uniform size.
sentences.cn: 在骨头之间砍削，使所有的排骨大小一致。

sentences.en: Drips of water rolled down the trousers of his uniform.
sentences.cn: 他的制服裤子在不停地滴水。

sentences.en: Grade A eggs must be of uniform size.
sentences.cn: A 级鸡蛋必须大小相同。

sentences.en: He was attired in a plain, mud-flecked uniform.
sentences.cn: 他身穿一件朴素的制服，上面满是泥点。

sentences.en: He was identified only by his uniform and personal belongings.
sentences.cn: 他的身份只是通过制服和个人财物确定了下来。

sentences.en: He was still wearing his school uniform.
sentences.cn: 他仍然穿着校服。

sentences.en: He was wearing a brown uniform.
sentences.cn: 他当时穿着褐色的制服。

sentences.en: His face blanched as he looked at Sharpe's blood-drenched uniform.
sentences.cn: 他一看到夏普浸满鲜血的制服，脸色顿时变得煞白。

sentences.en: His uniform bore the insignia of a captain.
sentences.cn: 他的制服上有上尉徽章。

sentences.en: His uniform made him look a trifle out of place.
sentences.cn: 他的制服让他看起来有些格格不入。

sentences.en: His uniform was crumpled, untidy, splashed with mud.
sentences.cn: 他的制服皱巴巴的，邋遢不堪，还溅上了泥点。

sentences.en: She was small and fragile and looked incongruous in an army uniform.
sentences.cn: 她又小又弱，穿一身军装看起来很不协调。

sentences.en: She will probably take great pride in wearing school uniform.
sentences.cn: 她大概会为穿上校服而感到非常得意。

sentences.en: That uniform makes the guards look absurd.
sentences.cn: 警卫们穿着那种制服看起来怪模怪样的。

sentences.en: The cost of your uniform will be deducted from your wages.
sentences.cn: 制服费将从你的工资中扣除。

sentences.en: The general's uniform was trimmed with gold braid.
sentences.cn: 将军的制服饰有金色穗带。

sentences.en: The middle button of his uniform jacket was strained over his belly.
sentences.cn: 制服上装中间的纽扣在他的肚子上绷得紧紧的。

sentences.en: The police wear dark blue uniforms.
sentences.cn: 警察穿深蓝色制服。

sentences.en: The price rises will not be uniform across the country.
sentences.cn: 全国各地的价格涨幅将不会划一。

words.tran_cn: 使穿制服（或军服）；使成一样（uniform的过去式）
使一律；使均匀；使始终如一

phrases.tran_cn: 统一惯例；统一处理规则

trans.tran_en: being the same in all its parts or among all its members
a particular type of clothing worn by all the members of a group or organization such as the police, the army etc
